description: Define LLMS and establish a clear research focus (e.g., Learning Management Systems, eLearning software, free solutions)
Identify key search terms and platforms to scour for free LLMS solutions (e.g., GitHub, OpenEdX, Moodle, Google search)
Research popular free LLMS options, including their features, user reviews, and system requirements
Investigate the open-source and proprietary aspects of free LLMS solutions, including their licensing agreements and community support
Document the pros and cons, advantages, and disadvantages of free LLMS solutions, as well as their potential scalability and customization capabilities
